item.title: New Container: Oscam
item.description: We have released a new container for Oscam! Oscam is an Open Source Conditional Access Module software used for descrambling DVB transmissions using smart cards. It’s both a server and a client.
item.content:
We have released a new container for Oscam!

Oscam is an Open Source Conditional Access Module software used for descrambling DVB transmissions using smart cards. It’s both a server and a client.
